attributes.additional_details: Privatising Channel 4 would seriously damage the channel, which has commissioned much high quality television since its inception. Privatising it would lead to a push for profit and a consequent drop in standards, and possibly to foreign ownership of the channel.
attributes.background: Plans to privatise Channel 4 should be dropped and it should be left with its current ownership and funding model.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995
